subject: Meeting Reminder
body: Hi, don't forget about the meeting at 3 PM.

subject: Project Update
body: The project is on track for completion by the end of the month.

subject: Lunch Invitation
body: Would you like to join me for lunch tomorrow?

subject: Weekly Report
body: Please find the weekly report attached.

subject: Team Outing
body: We are planning a team outing next weekend. Are you in?

subject: Budget Approval
body: The budget for the next quarter has been approved.

subject: Client Feedback
body: We received positive feedback from the client.

subject: New Hire
body: We have a new hire joining the team next week.

subject: Office Renovation
body: The office renovation will start next Monday.

subject: Training Session
body: There will be a training session on the new software.

subject: Holiday Schedule
body: The holiday schedule has been finalized.

subject: Server Maintenance
body: The server maintenance is scheduled for this weekend.

subject: Policy Update
body: Please review the updated company policies.

subject: Team Meeting
body: There will be a team meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.

subject: Performance Review
body: Your performance review is scheduled for next week.

subject: Project Kickoff
body: The project kickoff meeting is scheduled for Monday.

subject: Client Meeting
body: The client meeting is scheduled for next Wednesday.

subject: Budget Review
body: The budget review meeting is scheduled for Friday.
